channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No Lighting on path, 15th December
item.description:
The path to Sainsbury’s off Dig Kennel Hill has a number of lamps that are never working. Makes it dark and dangerous at night.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Estate Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human forest bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand, 15th December
item.description:
There are human forest bikes blocking pavement and cycle stand around 55 Baker street. The bikes need to be removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baker Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Racist graffiti, 15th December
item.description:
There is still a swastika graffiti that's not been removed. It's inside the big slide, towards the bottom of it. Please remove it

item.title: Pothole getting bigger, 15th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping at Whitewebbs, 15th December

item.title: Left with flat tyre for over a week on a blind corner on a dpeed reduction hump location a accident hot spot, 15th December
item.description:
Van left late at night flat tyre looks to be dumped, registration doesn't match the colour of government vehicle check description possible wrong plates no one has been near it for over a week, no neighbours no who's van it is. Matter of time before it causes a serious accident where its been left.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsdale Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Collapsing wall, 15th December
item.description:
Reported more than 2 weeks ago, but nothing done. The wall on the corner of a busy footpath is collapsing. Young children walk past here daily, and with a recent tragic incident close by, I’m surprised nothing has been done to resolve this ( bare minimum, the area taped off while work is carried out by home owner to make safe).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Edgebury, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Duvet dumped in private property bins, 15th December
item.description:
Someone dumped a duvet on n.42/44 Wellington gardens bins Can this be investigated?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hire bikes obstructing highway, 15th December
item.description:
There is a badly positioned hire bike parking space on Northiam Street. There are always too many bikes several of which have fallen over. The bikes always spill over the designated area so they block access, cause obstruction + fill scarce parking spaces

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northiam Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old leaves and litter, 15th December
item.description:
Dunlace Street has not been cleaned in a long time. So much litter up and down it and old fallen leaves.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunlace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
